class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| . >><<span class="ocsforge_color_lid"|a_elt>>>>>><<div class="odocwiki_info"|<<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|a service cont ~(~)>> creates a link to <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|service>>~.
    ~The text of
    the link is <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|cont>>~. ~For example <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|cont>> may be something like
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~[pcdata "click here"~]>>~.\\


    ~The last  parameter is for ~G~E~T parameters~.
    ~For example <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|a service cont ~(~4~2~,"hello"~)>>\\


    ~The <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~~a>> optional parameter is used for extra attributes~.\\


    ~The <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~~fragment>> optional parameter is used for the "fragment" part
    of the ~U~R~L~, that is~, the part after character "~#"~.\\


    ~When possible~, all links generated by ~Eliom are relative~, for example
    to make easier the use with reverse proxies~.
    ~But in case of protocol change ~(if you want to switch to https using
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~~https~:true>> for example~, or if the service imposes https~)~,
    absolute links will be generated~.
    ~In that case~,
    default hostname is determined from the <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Host>> http header of the request
    ~(or the attribute of ~<host~> tag in
    configuration file if the option <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~<usedefaulthostname~/~>>> is set~)~.
    ~Default port is the current port ~(or another port of the server if
    you are switching from or to https~)~.
    ~But you can choose the hostname or port you want by setting
    the optional <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?hostname>> and <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?port>> parameters here~.
    ~These options have no effect for relative links~.\\


    ~You can add non~-localized parameters using the optional parameter
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|nl~_params>>~. ~See <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Eliom~_parameters~.nl~_params~_set>>~.\\


    ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~~keep~_nl~_params>> is <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|`~Persistent>> ~(resp~. <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|`~All>>~)~,
    persistent ~(resp all~) non localized ~G~E~T parameters
    will be kept in the ~U~R~L ~(default is the default for the service~)~.\\


    ~If a client side application is running~, and unless
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~~no~_appl~:true>> is specified~, it will use <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~<a onclick~=~.~.~.~>>>
    instead of <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~<a href~=~.~.~.~>>> to send process cookies~.
    ~Thus~, if the destination service belongs to the same application~,
    the client side process will not be stopped when the link is clicked~.\\
>>
